main.name: Bilal El Houdaigui
main.description: I'm a software developer, I use mainly Python & React to develop robust and user-friendly web applications
main.bio: I'm known for being passionate about what I'm doing, firm believer that Googling effectively is an extremely useful skill, in my spare time I like to learn new technolgies and explore what's in the market, enjoy a walk in the forest or near the sea, I also like reading books, playing chess and video games.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch using the contact from below

resume.skillmessage: Tech stack that I'm learning and using recently (Always willing to learn)

work.company: EMBL's European Bioinformatics Institute (EMBL-EBI) - Hinxton, United Kingdom
work.title: Ensembl Applications Developer
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

work.company: Research Unit Genomic Info (URGI) at the French National Institute for Agricultural Research (INRA) - Versailles, France
work.title: Data Integration/Web Developer
work.description: Managing and developing workflows to Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) biological data from heterogeneous databases (Graph & SQL) AND Contributing to the development of the International Plant Data Portal of the French Institute of Bioinformatics.

work.company: Internship in Microbiology, Adaptation and Pathogenesis Laboratory - Lyon, France
work.title: Python Developer
work.description: The aim of the internship was to develop a model that simulates the transcription-supercoiling coupling of DNA in bacteria.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
